reviewText: I wish I would've seen the other review before this got purchased! Like she said, it does not play in US bluray players. I partly fault the seller for not saying it was a region B DVD! Annoying!!!

This was given to us as a gift- it is NOT a US blu-ray & will NOT play in US machines.  It's a UK edition.  If that's what you're looking for I'm sure it's worth 5 stars. Fantastic movies!  But since my kids were hoping to actually watch this in the US & the sales info on this disc isn't clearly marked, the grandparents who purchased it for them didn't realize & wasted their money.  Don't make the same mistake.  Just a warning.
